title: Forged in Fire
goal: Valerius tests Kaelen, and a shared threat solidifies their alliance.

beats.summary: Valerius challenges Kaelen to a duel or a trial of skill, testing his physical and magical prowess.
During the trial, an unexpected manifestation of the Whispering Corruption attacks the outpost, forcing them to fight together.
Witnessing Kaelen's power and resolve, and fighting alongside him, Valerius's skepticism turns to cautious trust, and he agrees to join their quest.
